LANGUAGE.LABEL: Email Lead Page
SPAMMING is the sending of unsolicitated email and is strictly prohibited.

Select a Lead Page to email to your new prospects and modify the subject and message if desired. You can optionally select an email template after you select a lead page. Enter the name and email address of each your new prospects. Each entry will be added as a new prospect and emailed the message below with a link to the selected Lead Page.
First Name
Last Name
Email Address
Phone (optional)

CATEGORY: Enter one or more keywords to categorize these new prospects. Your keyword(s) will be added to the new Prospect's description. You can search for any keyword by selecting "Description" in the search by listbox.
Lead Page
Templates
Subject
Keywords
Preview
Add and Send
Cancel
Close
